about_the_game: The game's additional story reveal pack "Guilty Me" offers exclusive content consisting of explanatory text. In this pack, players will have access to detailed and revealing information about the main plot, uncovering dark secrets and surprising twists. Get ready for an immersive experience, with gripping storytelling and mysteries to unravel, all through detailed and intriguing text.
